name: CommonPlaces Interactive
description:
CommonPlaces Interactive specializes in building custom websites that provide unique and engaging experiences that focus on connecting you to your customers. We combine technology, strategy and creativity to help communicate your digital message to your audience, no matter what device they are on. 
Core Specialties: Custom Web Development, Responsive Web Design, Digital Marketing
Recent Awards: Web Award for Outstanding Website - Verizon Innovative App Challenge, Best of Industry Web Award for Best Medical Equipment Website - BK Ultrasound, CIOReview "20 Most Promising Web Development & Design Solution Providers in 2015", Top Drupal Custom Development Company - 2014-2016
